Choreographers Shivani Bhagwan (@shivanibhagwan) and Chaya Kumar (@chayakumar) are the brains behind BFunk (@bfunk). ‚ÄúBFunk stands for the two styles of dance that we teach: BhangraFunk and BollyFunk,‚Äù explains Shivani. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a fusion between elements of our western upbringing and our eastern roots,‚Äù explains Chaya. ‚ÄúOur heritage is woven through every fiber of our work. Dance is not a recreation in India; it‚Äôs a part of our culture. It‚Äôs a means of celebration. It‚Äôs a means of storytelling. It‚Äôs a means of communication.‚Äù
According to Shivani, ‚Äú#APAHeritageMonth is wonderful because it promotes education, drives conversation and builds awareness, and that is the birthplace for growth.‚Äù
Photo of @bfunk by @pavithraphotos

#Cannes you believe it? Sundy Jules (@sundyjules) sure can‚Äôt. The 20-year-old French creator is at the Cannes Film Festival for the first time. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm excited for everything,‚Äù Sundy says. ‚ÄúThe films, the beach, the parties, hanging out with my friends, but definitely mostly excited for the films.‚Äù
Do you know how to say ‚Äúwalk the red carpet‚Äù in French? ü§î Find out from Sundy in a little quiz we like to call #GameOn, on our story now.

In many of her jewelry designs, Wing Yau, the fashion designer behind WWAKE (@wwake), features opals ‚Äî a stone she‚Äôs loved since childhood. ‚ÄúI had visited Australia and the South Pacific islands,‚Äù explains Wing. ‚ÄúWe collected opals and seashells, and so I have a deep-rooted nostalgia for those materials.‚Äù
Today, we‚Äôre with Wing in her studio, located in Brooklyn‚Äôs Greenpoint neighborhood. Watch our story to see more of Wing‚Äôs process, then shop her designs over on @shop ‚Äî a new account where you can discover and shop from up-and-coming designers. üåà‚ú®

Hello, world. Today‚Äôs #WeeklyFluff is Cliff (@call.me.cliff), a 3-year-old Siberian cat from Berlin who loves to curl up with a good book. üìñ üò∏ ‚ÄúCliff mostly sleeps on the books, whereas I like to read to them,‚Äù says Cliff‚Äôs human Ezgi.
Photo by @call.me.cliff
Dancer and vlogger Cameron Field (@cameronfield_) separates truth from fiction with a sense of humor.

Free stuff? Big photo shoots? Fancy things wherever you go? Today on our IGTV, dancer and vlogger Cameron Field (@cameronfield_) breaks down some of the myths influencers face... with a sense of humor. üôÉ

Photo by @cameronfield_
The first time equestrian Alex Bauwens (@alex_bauwens) shot a bow and arrow while on a horse, she knew mounted archery was the sport for her. Additional footage by @ladyphotographic.

Equestrian Alex Bauwens (@alex_bauwens) is bringing mounted archery back from the Middle Ages. üê¥‚ö°Ô∏èüèπ ‚ÄúI‚Äôm a big fan of fantasy books and film, and I love making those adventures real for people,‚Äù says Alex, who started riding horses when she was 3 and took up mounted archery ‚Äî or the sport of shooting a bow and arrow from horseback ‚Äî 10 years ago. ‚ÄúThe first time I shot a bow from a horse, I knew this was the sport for me,‚Äù she says.
See Alex shoot some arrows, today on our story and IGTV.
Photo by @alex_bauwens

Say hi to three rescue border collies with enough personality to star in their own show. ‚ÄúEnvy rules the house. She‚Äôs the oldest, the only girl and definitely the boss. Zain lives to please, and Trek is the trouble-maker,‚Äù says their human Kelly Bove (@kelly_bove). #WeeklyFluff 
Photo by @kelly_bove
Hang out with actress Millie Bobby Brown (@milliebobbybrown) in Paris as she shares her life story. ‚ù§Ô∏è #ThreeMinuteAutobiography

Last weekend in Paris, Millie Bobby Brown (@milliebobbybrown) attended the fan screening of her first-ever feature film, ‚ÄúGodzilla: King of the Monsters‚Äù (@godzillamovie). Right now on IGTV, she‚Äôs the special guest on our very first episode of ‚ÄúThree-Minute Autobiography,‚Äù where some of your favorite ‚≠êÔ∏è share their life story in just three minutes. #ThreeMinuteAutobiography

Tonight was Game 2 of the @nba Finals. üèÄüí´ Tune in to our Instagram story to see what the scene was like as the Golden State Warriors (@warriors) took on the Toronto Raptors (@raptors) for their first win in the series. #NBAFinals
